title: Slimes Can Dream Too! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Character Growth   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Dragons   Dreams   Elves   Familiars   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Monsters   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Orcs   Quirky Characters   Reincarnated as a Monster   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak Protagonist   World Tree
author: Davida   다비다
description:
I thought I would live a better life in my second lifetime. Unbelievably, I’ve reincarnated into a slime that rolls around on the ground. Anyway, this is my precious new life, so I must work hard. 

But I can’t believe the type of owner I must live with for the rest of my life. All he says is, ‘I’m lazy.’ He’s the black dragon, Kalgilm. 

While I’m the lowest class monster slime that must serve under him. >
